title: Jo's rosemary bread
ingredients: ['250ml water', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 1/2 teaspoons caster sugar', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1/4 teaspoon mixed Italian herbs', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon dried rosemary', '350g bread flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons dried active baking yeast']
